long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Email Scrapper

Description:

Easy Email Scrapper is a simple and efficient tool to help you collect email addresses from any website. With just one click, you can extract all the email addresses from the current webpage and view them in a clean, organized table.

Features:

One-Click Email Extraction: Easily scrape all email addresses from any webpage with a single click.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design makes it easy to use.
Instant Results: View the extracted emails in a clear, organized table within the extension.

Secure and Private: Only scrapes emails from the current webpage you are viewing. 

No data is sent to external servers.

Whether you're doing research, building a mailing list, or just need to collect emails from a webpage, Easy Email Scrapper is the tool for you. Install it now and start scraping emails effortlessly!
